title: Support raw image (vmlinux) loading for Aarch64
body:
Add support for Aarch64 to load vmlinux in PE format.

Note: In unit test, a binary file ("src/loader/test_arm64_pe.bin") is loaded. (For x86 test, it is "test_elf.bin") But as per our company's policy, I can't upload any binary file to a public repository. Please any maintainer help download the file from [here](https://github.com/firecracker-microvm/firecracker/blob/master/kernel/src/loader/test_pe.bin) and upload. Thanks.

Signed-off-by: Michael Zhao <michael.zhao@arm.com>

title: Fix bzImage tests
body: The 4.9.0-9 kernel is no longer available.

title: CODEOWNERS: Make PullAssigner the default owner
body:
The PullAssigner bot [1] will pick 2 github handles from the gate
keepers list [2] and assign them for reviewing any new PR.
The bot goes uses a round robin algorithm to select handles from the
list.

What happens when the CODEOWNERS file gets populated with real
owners? Following the PR review and approval process [3], the
PullAssigner bot will either pick only one or zero reviewers from the
gate keepers list, if the CODEOWNERS file points to exactly one or more
than one actual ownwer, respectively.

[1] https://pullpanda.com/assigner
[2] https://github.com/rust-vmm/community/blob/master/GATEKEEPERS.md
[3] https://github.com/rust-vmm/community#pr-review-and-approval

Signed-off-by: Samuel Ortiz <sameo@linux.intel.com>

title: loader: Regenerate bootparams.rs
body:
Run rust-bindgen against the latest stable version of bootparams.h
(v5.2 tag - 0ecfebd2b52404ae0c54a878c872bb93363ada36)

Generated with:

bindgen bootparam.h -o bootparam.rs --with-derive-default
--with-derive-partialeq --no-doc-comments

Bindgen version: 0.51.0

Signed-off-by: Rob Bradford <robert.bradford@intel.com>

title: loader: Add ACPI RSDP address to boot_params
body:
As per changes to the Linux kernel boot_params struct add the ACPI RSDP
address.

Signed-off-by: Rob Bradford <robert.bradford@intel.com>

title: Inital linux loader crate
body:
- Based on Firecracker and crosvm code
- Added bzImage support
- Added buildkite CI and kcov based code coverage
